products.title: Real Silk Pale Gold  Roman Blind
products.description: With just a touch of subtlety, this real silk pale gold roman blind brings elegance and grace into your home, in a flash. The soft, serene shade is the perfect shade of neutral. It works with light and dark schemes alike, whilst the touch of sheen makes sure your home is always with just a touch of subtlety, this real silk pale gold roman blind brings elegance and grace into your home, in a flash.

products.title: Keswick Gold Roman Blind - Standard Lining
products.description: A plain lightly textured fabric which has a sheen finish. A lovely fabric to brighten up a room. Available in other colours. Keswick gold roman blind - standard lining available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Harper Gold
products.description: Min width: 300mm max width: 1350mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 62% polyester 38% cotton guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: ivory poly cotton lining as standard, white blackout lining and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 30mm wide x 43mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
